name: Image Hotspots
description: Interactive image with clickable information points. Great for diagram labeling, map exploration, and visual teaching.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate hotspot descriptions for an image

schema.image_description: string - Description of the main image (for AI image generation)

hotspots.label: string - Short label for the hotspot
hotspots.description: string - Detailed description shown when clicked

example.image_description: A detailed diagram of an animal cell showing all major organelles

hotspots.label: Nucleus
hotspots.description: The control center of the cell that contains genetic material (DNA). It regulates gene expression and cell division.

hotspots.label: Mitochondria
hotspots.description: The powerhouse of the cell that produces ATP through cellular respiration.

hotspots.label: Endoplasmic Reticulum
hotspots.description: A network of membranes involved in protein and lipid synthesis.

hotspots.label: Cell Membrane
hotspots.description: The outer boundary that controls what enters and exits the cell.

params.text:
Nucleus

The control center of the cell that contains genetic material (DNA). It regulates gene expression and cell division.

conversion_notes.image_required: Requires an image to be uploaded or generated first
conversion_notes.position_format: Positions are percentages from top-left corner
conversion_notes.content_types: Hotspot content can include H5P.Text, H5P.Image, H5P.Video
conversion_notes.ai_image_generation: Use image_description for AI image generation prompt
